txt.en: DNT he seems poised and ready - you hear a sound - look out!
With the guidance of Glathlírel, search for Glorfindel in the Rift of Nûrz Ghâshu.
Weaken the Balrog Thaurlach to allow Glorfindel to defeat it
The hurried shuffling of feet can be heard from the hall.
Find a way past the locked gate
Search the Rift of Nûrz Ghâshu for clues of Glorfindel's whereabouts.
'[placeholder], we must look for clues as to the whereabouts of Glorfindel.\n\n'We know not what lurks in the Rift of Nûrz Ghâshu now, so prepare yourself.'
'It is time to leave this place. I must seclude myself a little while and consider the prophecy of Gil-galad I have found. Then, as soon as I am able, I shall find my way to Caras Galadhon.'
Fend off the attacking Pale-folk Defenders.
'I thought I knew all there was to know of the Balrog Thaurlach. How mistaken I was! I have much yet to learn.'
Continue to look for clues of Glorfindel's whereabouts.

'I felt the dark presence brooding nearby when first I entered this place, but the prize I sought was too important and I was not to be deterred. Still, I had hoped to slip away as quietly as I came, and instead I walked nearly into its opened maw!

'Fortune smiled upon me, however, and you came upon us at just that moment. Not the mightiest warrior of Elves or Men would face a Balrog alone, willingly -- though I yet flatter myself I might have been its match.

'We should not tarry here, I think. I have found what I came here seeking, though I must take some time in secluded peace to read it over and pierce its deeper meaning. I cannot pause overlong, however, for I am expected in the Court of Lothlórien. Ah, but I see you knew that.

'Perhaps, then, you may do me a double service. First, return there forthwith and assure Galadriel and Celeborn I am on my way. Second, tell Galadriel that I wish to give the Gwedluith I entrusted to her to Arwen, as a betrothal gift. Indeed, I would have you bear the gift to her, [placeholder].'
You should talk to Glorfindel, now that Thaurlach is defeated.
Find a way past the locked gate.
DNT so yeah, that was a thing
You have found a clue and should examine it.
DNT this is how I uncovered the prophetic verse, which brought me here. Also, here is a gift for arwen. I wish you would bring it to her. We will meet in Lothlorien when it is time.
The clue leads just past the door, Glorfindel should be just beyond it.
Weaken the Balrog Thaurlach so Glorfindel can finish it once and for all.
Follow Glathlírel to search for clues of Glorfindel's whereabouts
Glathlírel is ready to explore the Rift of Nûrz Ghâshu once again, in search of Glorfindel.
Continue following Glathlírel to seek clues of Glorfindel's whereabouts
Hear what Glorfindel has to say.

'Balrogs are not so easily slain. Though they may seem defeated, they may heal and even regain form with time. This lesson I have learned, painfully, in ages past.\n\n'Fortunately, I possess the art required to fully extinguish such a foe. Come and fight by my side. Together we will put a final end to this fell servant of Morgoth.'
